body:
Comment 2: 
Just the man I would like to comment <g>!

I think the problem is not with Windows extension, but with the fact, that cgo/life
directory contains 2 different things from build point of view: life command (main.go)
and life package (life.go). If we could separate these into separate directories, we
would be able to employ gomake/goinstall to build it. Then we won't have issues with
output filenames.
